at.ac.tuwien.infosys.g2021.daemon

Class Adapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • at.ac.tuwien.infosys.g2021.daemon.ValueChangeProducer
      • at.ac.tuwien.infosys.g2021.daemon.Adapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ValueChangeConsumer
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AdapterChain, DummyAdapter, FilteringAdapter, LowpassAdapter, ScalingAdapter, TriggeringAdapter

    abstract class Adapter
extends ValueChangeProducer
implements ValueChangeConsumer
    An adapter is an object, that transforms a value to another. Value changes may be initiated by signalling a value change over the ValueChangeConsumer-interface or by any asynchronous other event (eg. the system timer). Changes of the adapter value are signalled over the ValueChangeConsumer-interface.
